Reviews.Author: Noelani
Reviews.Content: Love juice standard!   The 1st juicery in lv and they know what they're doing.   Only wish they offered made to order juices as well.    In comparison to other juiceries, the end product is super flavorful.    Cons:  super pricey and I think they may be losing a group of customers to whole foods because I know sometimes some of us want to create our own recipes!  Just food for thought.    Great knowledgeable staff though!

Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: I love this place.. I come her almost daily on my lunch break.. Great product, great customer service, and a wealth of knowledge

Reviews.Author: Cece
Reviews.Content: Amazing recipes, friendly and educated staff, and organic ingredients! Delicious and good for you!

Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I come back here a few times a week. Freshest juice I've had in Las Vegas. Their nut milks are my favorite, the one with spirulina is a staple for me. Their smoothies are great too. The ambiance is simple and very clean and the service is great. The workers are always willing to help out. The juices, nut milks, and smoothies are pricey - $9-$12 but worth it.

Reviews.Author: Amelinda
Reviews.Content: I was having severe abdominal pain for almost a week and even with a visit to urgent care, I couldn't figure out what was going on. A medical professional mentioned that it may be my gallbladder and prescribed me three medications that unfortunately didn't help! After having another attack, I took matters into my own hands and decided to research foods that naturally help your gallbladder and most importantly, avoid irritating it.  I found that vegetable juices like beet, cucumber, tender baby greens, swiss chard, dandelion greens, beet greens, celery, carrots, ginger, and tumeric are great for gallbladder health as well as organic grape and apple juices. Other helpful foods to add to juices: lemon, avocado, vinegar, berries, papaya, pears, and flax and hemp seeds/oils.  Therefore, I was on a mission to find organic, cold-pressed juices that utilized these foods and hoped it would heal me! The store is very easy to find, in fact, I had seen it while driving by on Ft. Apache. Access and parking is simple as well. I love the interior! The adorable bee and honeycomb theme complete with adorable packaging, matching wall art, and the amazing table re-purposed from a tree!  The staff was so friendly, helpful, and insisted on samples. I told him which juices intrigued me and why, so I honed in on Bee WHealthy and Bee On Point. After sampling the two, I chose Bee On Point that is comprised of cucumber, celery, carrot, apple, kale, beet, dandelion, radish, lemon, ginger, turmeric, and pepper (16.9 fl. oz. for $10.99). Neither of the juices really tickled my fancy in the flavor department, however, that truly doesn't bother me nor will it stop me from future consumption because I need to minimize sugar (even natural sugar) intake as much as possible and that's typically what makes juices taste better.  Anyway, the juice was great and filled me for three hours! That was enough time for me to finish what I needed to do for the day and get home for my next meal. The great news is that after just THREE days of eating and drinking the gallbladder-helpful foods, I was able to stop the attacks! It's really wonderful having access to a place like The Juice Standard to have truly healing products when you have health issues. It was honestly the only place I trusted to have something that wouldn't trigger another attack and I was very grateful for it. Your body will heal itself if you give it the right tools.   FYI: You receive $1 off for each glass bottle returned! But the bottles are so nice, you might want to find a purpose for them at home. Also, keep in mind that these bottles are 99.9% juice which means you're getting the good stuff, not just water or miscellaneous fillers. Yay for cold-pressed!

Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: Ooooh! Organic pressed juice, what more can I ask for? I love the flavor profile of their concoctions! Will have to try their cleanse one day!

Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Acai crunch = amazing !!  I must admit that this is my new favorite place. My husband and I enjoy the acai crunch very munch that we actually got it two days in a row!!  Going back soon for some of their amazing juices. Cool thing is they let you sample pretty much everything. Also, the employees are sweethearts!  5 stars and two thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: This place is highly addicting.   I stop by once a day for coffee , juice or even the food .  Staff is friendly and   Knowledgeable about food and all produce and supplements that are in juice selection.

Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: What a great little juice shop. Started to get the flu and decided to add some healthy juices to my diet. Staff was very friendly and helpful as I tried about 20 different juices. Each juice bottle runs between $11 to $13 and has a refrigerator storage life of about 7 days is what is told to you in the store. Make sure to read the date that is on the bottle. Tried all the different flavors and can't say I disliked any of them. One of the cashew milk drinks taste just like horchata. Wanted to try the Watermelon drink, but it was out of season. Nicely decorated on the inside and tends to get really busy throughout the day. Was told they are opening one soon in the Henderson area. All organic is the most common words spoken in this place. So if you are concerned about that, this is the place for you. Great helpful and friendly customer service with a smile.

Reviews.Author: Nicolle
Reviews.Content: Ok so I was a juice virgin before coming here and let me tell you they are so kind! Damn near pulled out everything for ME until I found something that my pallete could handle!!! Appreciated

Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Back at the original location tonight, not as large as the Hendo store, but still stocked with juice. All juice is organic and GMO free.   I have had most of the non juice options they offer my favorite being the protein power,the dates and beer pollen are what brings me back.   If you are feeling brave try the wellness shot; ginger, lemon, cayenne.

Reviews.Author: Lolita
Reviews.Content: My first time at juice standard and Stacy was so helpful she explained to us each juice and it effect, also allowed us to taste several Stacy is great and my experience was great look forward to going back

Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: Beats other juiceries, by far! Their mission, their products, I much prefer over others. Juice Standard and Fruits ' n Roots are my go to when I want convenience and goodness. Ingredients are top shelf.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I love this place! The staff are knowledgeable,  friendly & efficient.  The juice flavors are delicious and ready to go when I get there.  That helps when I am in a hurry and need to grab a juice and go.

Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: I've been meaning to write a review -- but never had the chance until now.  My first visit was around Nov. 2014. Before I actually decided to try the juices, I did some research on the company and  the benefits of organic juices. I was drawn to Jamie's story and how juicing has helped change her family's lifestyle. This was important to me because I needed a more convenient way to have breakfast or lunch since I am always on the go.   As I walked in, I was immediately greeted by the workers.  Everyone was very welcoming and explained the different types of juices offered. On a biological perspective, I was thoroughly impressed by the knowledge the workers had on the juices (esp since I got my degree in biology). This only solidified that the workers are properly trained and genuinely care about educating customers to better their health.   What's great about The Juice Standard is that they let you try every flavor ! I tried samples of different juices since I was interested in trying the 1-day cleanse. Some of the juices I was not too fond off - I felt that it is more of an acquired taste. However, the flavor I enjoyed the most is  Bee Magnificent  and decided to get a 16.9 fl oz bottle.   Overall, I had a good experience and will definitely come back. On my next visit, I hope to meet both Jamie & Marcella! Can't wait to try their new location!  Pros: -Great Service -Organic -Knowledgeable staff -Very Clean -Helps regulate your tummy and make you  regular  again  -If you return your glass bottle, you get $1 off your next purchase!  Cons: -Kinda pricey (if you're on a college budget - but worth it!!!) -A lot of time on the toilet

Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Excellent selection of juices and coffee! The food is great as well. I've been here atleast 50 times now for juice and food and every single time the staff are incredibly helpful and super friendly! Definitely check this place out for health food needs!!!

Reviews.Author: Terra
Reviews.Content: The customer service here is fantastic. The location isn't convenient for me but that will not stop me from going back!   The juices are delicious. Far better than Pressed Juicery & Blue Print Cleanse. Be Grateful is my favorite so far but I bought 3 others to try as well.

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I am so happy this juice bar opened up and right in my neighborhood. I came here during their soft opening and it seemed like they already had some regulars as I noticed them calling someone by name.  When I walked in, I immediately liked the look of the inside with the menu and the pamphlets, cute names of products, and helpful tips with juicing. The owners were very helpful and Marcella explained to me all about their juices, how they are made, and the benefits. I appreciated the taste test area because of course we all want to know what we are going to get.  I was interested in a 3 day juice cleanse but seeing that I have never juiced an entire day, I was not sure how I would respond or if I could handle it. I ended up only doing one day.   The Magnificent- filtered water, raw cashew, agave, vanilla bean, and cinnamon.  perfect at night time when you have been juicing all day. It felt like a treat and I don't know what it was but I was unable to finish it. I'm not sure if it was the juice overload or what did it.   I also liked the Energized, the Love, and the one with cayenne pepper. I like the glass bottle packaging but can I say it does not do well with drinking straight out of the bottle, lots of spills. Maybe you are expected to pour it or use a straw. The small plastic bottles are much easier to drink right out of.   I would like to try the juice cleanse again but probably when I don't have to work and can stay home. I appreciate the $1 off for bringing back the bottles. I wish they had some sort of loyalty card or system though because the cost is pretty high for me.   I know Marcella mentioned the juices have a 4 day shelf life but I wonder if the date on top was the expiration date or the date made. My juices had different dates on top.   In all I am happy a healthy place like this opened up near home where I can come get some good quality juice.

Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: It's simply perfection in every bottle. The stuff there is very professional and the place looks always  super clean. Before you choose what to drink they offer tastes of any juice on the menu. Definitely the best juice place in Las Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: Walked in today after doing some research. The woman, who's name I can't remember! Was amazing she gave me a sample of just about every single juice they had, ALL of which were AMAZING!!!!! She was super informative on the ingredients as well as the benefits of each juice. Needless to say they have earned a returning customer! And they offer support for juicing at only $60 a day. (If you've tried it at home this well worth every penny)

Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: Love snagging a smoothie or juice from TJS!  This little spot is always refreshing.  The people are great, the store is really cool and the food is delicious.  Spot in if you haven't yet!

Reviews.Author: Kelsie
Reviews.Content: I love The Juice Standard.  It was recommended to me by a coworker who know the owner, Jamie. Jamie is a delight. She is knowledgeable and passionate about what she is doing and has quality product to back it up. I am not a health nut by any means, and I HIGHLY enjoyed them. I will be returning and telling everyone I know.

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Herr yea!  A local juice bar i'm down to support.  They bottle their juice at the store with locally farmed raw produce without HPP (High Pressure Processing).  HPP is just a method to extend shelf life, and from what i read it has very little effects in characteristic of molecular food compounds; taste, vitamins, and nutrients.  Hence why Juice Standards are super duper fresh, Bee!  Without the HPP they're also able to package their cold-press juice in glass bottles which you can return each for a $1 discount off your next purchased.  Bottles are $10 each for 16.9oz and there are many to choose from.    I eat pretty bad since i have retarded hours [but mainly because you, f-nuts (i mean that in the nicest way possible) always yelp tasty looking spots] , so i've always try to include green juice in my daily intake when im on the go esp when i wake up on an empty stomach.  Thankfully i don't need all that fiber i'm missing out on, and other than that I don't really mess with any other root or fruit juice.  Personal choice.  So this store is really cool because when you walk in you can see huge cambros full of raw veggies through the glass refrigerator doors.  They do everything in house, not in the front i would think but in the back.  They just store some in the front along with ready to be purchased juice bottles or samples with the help of Jamie or Marcella who are both knowledgable about their products.  Today, I was able to pick out my fav green juice, Bee Love (Carrots, Celery, Parsley, Spinach) from them with Jamie's guidance.   I've also picked up Bee Effective (Apple, Zucchini, Spinach, Swiss Chard, Radish, Celery, Romaine, Kale, Parsley, Coconut Water), and it says it contain tree nuts, but it's actually the coconut.   And just because of allergy season I never got to try, but I got two bottles of the Bee True To You(Cucumber, Lemon, Ginger, Turmeric, Honey, Cayenne) which has some local Honey in it.  I doubt two bottles will have any effect of the outcome, but i still want to try anyways.  Tasted good but got a nice throat kick to it with it.  Juice Standard has an amazing thing going on.  I've only see a juice bar like this in cali, but these ladies have more confident in their own products which having me believing in them too.  And about once a week i'll need reassurance.    Tip:  Savor your juice.  Swirling in your mouth is important part of digestive system.  Your saliva has Ptyalin, an enzyme that helps break down food and speed up chemical reaction so your body can retain more nutrient.

Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Visited here as my boyfriend's co-workers have been raving about the place. Located in a strip mall, the outdoor tables with potted plants and the fancy oak countertop added a cute, different vibe to the place. The staff was great, offering to walk us through the entire menu with samples of all of their juices and nut milk. Most of the juices were good, some were outstanding, and we really enjoyed the nut milk. Ordered a smoothie and some juices to go and the smoothie was so good. Prices are high for me to visit here very often, but the juice was fresh, tasty, and it was clear that the employees are truly excited about the product they have to offer.

Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: I love juicing!!!! It's a nice detox for a day or two. This is located in a complex not too hard to find. The store is very small but the decor is still very nice ! I came in and the staff were very helpful. Customer service is why I'm giving this place a 5 star. There's outside seating and even a dog bowl for water. Duke came with me to run errands today, so he was very happy to see that bowl. Happy juicing !!!!

Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: Huge fan.. The juices are the best.. The bullet coffee is on point.. my wife and I enjoy the flight shots... we are there on a daily basis.. Keep up the great work guys... Thanks Elle

Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: Finally!!!! Soooo excited about this place! Great customer service and an awesome selection of juice. Very knowledgable on their product as well. Vegas finally has a cold pressed juice bar!!!!

Reviews.Author: Frieda
Reviews.Content: Helpful and personable clerks. The juice tastes fresh and you can tell the ingredients are quality. They are a little heavy handed with the ingredients. Even when something is supposed to be healthy, paying attention the the flavor profile and overall taste should still be important.

Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Great customer service!!!  We went after a run and got to try the juices before deciding what to get!!  Will definitely come back :)

Reviews.Author: Sunisa
Reviews.Content: I am loyal to juice standard!  They're literally 2 minutes away and knowledgable and very sweet.  The glass bottles are THE reason I go here and not anywhere else,  well and cause it's close by.  They give you a dollar for each bottle you bring back.  I decorated my carrier and they compliment it.   of it wasn't for juice standard I might've not broken my Starbucks runs, even though I just got chai and green tea drinks there.  I haven't had their smoothies but people don't seem to like those.  So I give 5 stars since I have nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Author: Lina
Reviews.Content: I love this juice bar!!! You have options from meal replacement, energy, and also refreshing drinks. Although the nut juices were delicious I stuck with the lighter options.  This is a great bar to get a loved one to intake their vegetables.. (AKA my boyfriend lol). He never eats vegetables and loved the Bee Excellent and also Bee on Point :). I went with the Bee Alkaline, which is a lighter option of cucumber, celery, kale, and radish.  I highly recommend Bee Pure and Bee Whealthy as well! Great place for giving you $1.00 in cash for every bottle returned as well. Great service everytime I come in!!!

Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Very refreshing juice spot overall. Close to the LVAC on 215/Flamingo.  Delicious fresh pressed juices and a few smoothie options. They also provide a 10-15 minute demo with explanations of all their juices and why particular ingredients provide the explosions of flavors in every sip. Polite , well - trained staff and a very clean , classy décor. If you are a health-nut, fitness monster, or somebody just that wants to feel better , you SHOULD definitely check this place out.

Reviews.Author: Irma
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to check this place out,  I've been to Pressed for Juice & love it but I really wanted to try this lil spot too, so there I went. I was greeted promptly with a smile,  the young girl asked if I had been here before, when I answered no,  she yelled  we have a first timer here  that was weird lol anyway while reading through the menu she asked if I had questions or specific flavors I like (sweet, green etc) I told her that i noticed  Dandelion  in alot of the drinks and I don't care for the floral taste. She proceeded to recommend the most popular one  BeeWHealthy  I took the sample and what do I taste?  Dandelion  yup on the ingredient list =/ I wish maybe someone with more knowledge and experience with ingredients was at the front counter...I ended up ordering the Acai Crunch and for that I give the 3 stars, it was really good but was given to me in a cup with a lid and a spoon.... in which the spoon does not come through the hole in the lid? That was annoying and a tease until I could get home, remove the lid and finally enjoy it. Pressed for Juice has theirs in a bowl and is delicious as well and overall just a better experience for me.

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love their juices. The lady was kind enough to let me and my friends try the entire menu and educated us with all the different benefits of each drink. A little on the pricier side but they use all organic produce. I'm hooked! :)

Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Ok so 've been really putting off coming to this juice place for awhile knowing that they are quite pricy. But boy is it worth it.  Especially if you are a hard core juicer or if you just like to juice to stay healthy you know how expensive it is to juice yourself. But besides all that the juice here are so yummy and it takes away all the complication of juicing yourself.   Juicing at home can be messy and take a super long time so it is extremely convenient to just stop in and pick up a delicious jar of freshly squeeze juice.   They offer a wide verity of flavors and they are so good. Try the tasting when you get a chance to sample some of the flavors so you know which ones you like. They run about $9 a bottle and when you bring the glass bottle back you get $1 back towards your next purchase.   I love The Juice Standard and didn't think I would BEE addicted!

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This is the ONLY place here with ORGANIC COLD PRESSED JUICES and you can get ones that are juiced the day you go in. This is a great concept and real important if you don't want your juice that is heated in a traditional juicer which looses about half of its enzymes. I will support my local business person and pay what they want since they are providing a very good product. Its not cheap to be healthy. If you want to save lots of money then get a NORWALK JUICER for $2,500 and prep all your organic veggies and clean up yourself.

Reviews.Author: Defy
Reviews.Content: great spot - close to the house, friendly staff and great drinks - simple deal.  Ive been back many times

Reviews.Author: Deonna
Reviews.Content: I love this place! Freshest juice in town with knowledgeable and friendly service. It is a bit on the pricey side but that doesn't stop me from indulging.

Reviews.Author: Izanami
Reviews.Content: I drive all the way across town for these awesome nut milks! Sure I can juice at home but these milks are like dessert. Elle is super friendly and helpful and I certainly recommend the juice tasting. They want to make sure you are happy with the product. Pricey but it's nice to indulge every once and awhile. Can't wait for the new location opening on St. Rose.

Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Slow service. Surly customer service. Great juice and smoothie but I will not be back.

Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Great juice but I wish for the price they were all organic! The nut milk ones are amazing!

Reviews.Author: Vickie
Reviews.Content: I am true believer of juicing! The Juice Standard is a great place for people who do not have the time to juice themselves. They offer a full tasting sample on your first visit! This is great and very important! If you are a newbie, it's a must to taste all the drinks they offer! My favorites are the nut milks because it's harder for me to make these at home. The prices may be a little high for some, but can you really put a price on good health?   The Juice Standard is my go to when I didn't have time to prep for lunch or when I want to spoil myself with a delicious nut milk!   Thanks Jaime and team!

Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: This is my favorite place in the world for fresh cold pressed juices!! Everyone that works here is so friendly and helpful. The nut milks are heaven! You can add a shot or two of espresso to any nut milk for an extra boost of energy. They also have fresh smoothies which I have not tried yet, but I'm sure they will not disappoint me.

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: This is a bright and vibrant little juice shop with super friendly and knowledgeable staff. As others have mentioned, the staff will walk you through every variety of juice and packages they offer. The best part?? They will let you sample everything with a smile!    I opted to try their one day juice cleanse. The offer anything from a 1 day cleanse/ 3 day cleanse/ 4+ day cleanse.  Warning: Juice prices are on the high end here. They offer fresh cold pressed organic juice and it doesn't come cheap (understandably so...). I've always wanted to try a cleanse and purchased their prepackaged juice option (see photos).   Overall, I loved their juices and enjoyed my one day cleanse. I did not do this to drop weight and do not believe that cleanses should be intended for that. I DO think that this is a good way to get a lot of vitamins in your system and think that cleanses are good to reset cravings and kick start a healthy lifestyle program. Besides, I enjoy juices regularly without a cleanse.

Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: Love, love this place!!!  I found it by chance because I had just gotten off of a weekend of partying from my bachelorette party and needed to detox and reset my body.  There happened to be a Living Social coupon (different company) for a juice cleanse, so that's what originally sparked my interest.  I always rather support local business, so I yelped juice bars and came across this gem :)  Both owners were there and were so friendly and knowledgable.  Jamie gave us our sampling and explained what each juice does.  We decided to do a 3 day cleanse and it was pretty easy.  The amount, how many bottles a day you drink and the duration between each one I think was the trick.  I could've done more!  Next time, I'll probably do 5 days or maybe even 7.  All the juices tasted great, and I loved the  suggested  order of drinking them.  The magnificent, which was the cashew milk one, was so perfect to end the evening.  I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to reset, recharge or just wants to do something good for their body :)

Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this place ! My first time there was nothing short of amazing. I forgot the nice guys name that let me sample all the juices to see which ones I liked, but he was really tall and had great customer service ! Super cool concept , I loved the Bee Grateful and the Bee Energized :) I will definitely be back !

Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Life changing! The Juice Standard is the single greatest thing to happen to the human body since vitamins! Take the three days worth of juices combo/mixture and cleanse your body and your soul. It's $60 a day and the cleanse is for three days, so be ready to part with $180 and change your life!! Renewal! Refreshing! Joy!!  Thank you, Juice Standard!!

Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Not only are they serving beautiful juices but because it is %100 organic they are contributing to mankind and the love ! Full of wholesome sustenance; these pure juices make love to you. lol

Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: Excellent!!!! & Organic!!!! The best tasting cold pressed juice I've ever had. The combinations they offer are outstanding. Delicious!! I'm totally addicted.

Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Amazing, juices and smoothies both my friends and I loved. They offer a tasting sampler that really helps you get a literal flavor for what this place is all about. We would have loved this in Durango Colorado! They even mixed up my girlfriends Visi protein powder into her smoothie making it taste like a delicious frozen ice cream. We met the owner and she helped us get some direction so much to choose from...The new hot spot I think:))

Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: Love love!  It's my favorite go to juice place!  The people are so friendly and their juice blends are tasty and consistent.  I usually sub a meal with one of their juices and I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I think this place is amazing and I will continue to get cold pressed juice from them! I was surprised at how  good everything tastes. I also am in love with the fact that they recycle your bottles and give you $1 a bottle towards another juice or in cash! Great place won't be sorry!!

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The Juice Standard has a great product and although a higher price range to some, the price for your health is infinite.  The friendly staff is always eager to answer questions and the atmosphere is great.  Well done!

Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: YELP 365 CHALLENGE 2014-(135/365)  The Healthy Meal Replacement   This is a great spot to fuel up after a a$$-whoopin' workout! Case and point? After a good a$$-whooping at Decibel Crossfit, I was beyond hungry and needed to refuel muy pronto!  The Juice Standard was the first thing that popped up on my Yelp App and I figured I'd use the opportunity to delete a bookmark then seek out a lunch spot. Owners Jaime and Marcella are two blessings in disguise that bring a much needed product to Vegas, as we unfortunately live in a city where GMO, processed and HFC drink options are everywhere, and the Juice Standard is a very refreshing option.  Depending on what you are looking for, there are different combinations and blends to fit your needs, and there's even samples upfront for you to try before making a purchase. I tried a green one which was a little too grassy for me at that moment then a few more after that. I managed to settle on the Grateful and Excellent blends.  After a few sips of the Grateful blend (I shared the Excellent blend with wifey the next day), I actually felt my hunger disappear! It probably has to do with the HPP process, and your body absorbs and retain the healthy nutrients quicker.  They also have juice cleansing packets if you choose to do so. Blends are $10-$11(16.9 ounces) with a four day shelf life(From the date processed) and a $1 deposit for every returned bottle. Give the Juice Standard a try and do your health a favor, ALOHA!!!  Shaka Meter:  \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  5 *Sip and savor your juice...DO NOT CHUG!!!

Reviews.Author: Clairin
Reviews.Content: Hip hip hooray three times!  Local! Organic! Renewable! The Juice Standard (TJS) offers a gift program. In addition to gift cards, you can purchase pressed juice as a gift. I was one lucky recipient of a 6 bottle gift. I was surprised at my office with juices to refresh, replenish, and rejuvenate me. Such a wonderful surprise had me smiling and keeping me up with my day.  TJS is local, locally owned, focused on organic and seasonal produce, and promotes sustainability with a recycling program for the glass bottles. And glass is better! Say no to chemicals from plastic leached into your foods, plastic, especially #1, #3, #6, and #7, has been found to leach potential carcinogens and other chemicals into the bottled liquid. Thank you TJS for a focus on health and wellness in Las Vegas.

Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: Came here for the first time yesterday. Can't believe I haven't been here sooner.   I am not going to complain about the prices being high because that is subjective and everything has a different value for different people. I am a local business owner and do not have time to search, buy, prep and juice organic fruits and veggies. For me it's worthed . I'm writing my review based on my experience there.   The girl helping me was super informative and gave me samples of everything. I loved how all the ingredients and percentage of juice is printed in clear sight.   I made the decision to purchase one cashew milk based bottle (super cool spirulina with blue green algae) and one bottle of the  On Point .   I will def be going back for a 3 day cleanse which includes 8 small drinks per day. For $60 it's less than $8/ juice and you will see results with ingredients.

Reviews.Author: Ivy
Reviews.Content: Service is good, some staff very knowledgeable, others there for just a check. From the craigslist job post, it makes it seem like this establishment would be a completely vegan and plant based one. Once I made the trip, I realized that they use animal's products, like Greek yogurt and some type of butter, which makes no sense because who wants butter in anything at a Juice Shop?  I think The Juice Standard need to raise it's standards.

Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: i've been waiting for a juice store to open here and this one has everything you'd want.   fresh,  cold-pressed, and(most importantly) delicious juices.   The staff is very knowledgable and helpful with tastings and explanations of what each juice does.   The nut milks are so good!  they'll make you believe you can survive a juice cleanse :P

Reviews.Author: Cynthya
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this place !!! The juices, nut milks and  coffee are amazing . I am addicted to The bee magnificent and e3live . The staff is so attentive and informative. This is exactly what Ive been searching for in Las Vegas

Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: So I woke up bright eyed and bushy tailed, with an extra pep in my step, at 5 am. Don't hate, I'm a morning person. I just finished the 3 day cleanse and I feel great. I've done 2 day cleanses before (I haven't tried a fresh juice cleanse), and I'm usually not happy with either the taste, or the way I feel, this one was completely different.   I'm not an at-home juicer, first of all, I don't possess the equipment nor do I have the motivation to create what they are making at The Juice Standard, high quality cold pressed juices.    You're given 8 juices to drink per day, I never once felt hungry, shaky or even a headache. All the juices tasted great, my favorite was the magnificent.  High quality, organic cold pressed juices being served and so convinient for everyones busy lifestyle. I would love to try a 4+ day cleanse in the future. Make sure to follow them on IG, you will see how they create these healthy juices.  I was also able to try bullet proof coffee here for the first time, I wasn't sure how I felt about it at first, but I ended up liking it.

Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Stopped in today as I was in that area. Had a Bee Chill which is watermelon, cucumber and lemon. It was super refreshing. Really nice staff too as I tried a few before picking what I wanted. Nice place!

Reviews.Author: Bess
Reviews.Content: Best cold-pressed juice blends I've ever tasted. I experienced a 10-day juice cleanse with them and lost 7 lbs. The cleanse was a breeze because their juice was SO good. I love TJS!

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Delicious! I keep coming back for the Bee Happy nut milk. Discovered this place after a friend bought me a 1 day juice cleanse for my bday! Bring your bottle and tote each time for $1 off for each! Thank you to this incredible staff too! Always a great welcome & take the time to make sure you sample these exotic flavors. Today, Brandon helped me and just his wonderful energy and customer service makes this place continue to be such a star! Thank you. I'll be back

Reviews.Author: Roxy
Reviews.Content: Because friends don't let friends drink bad juice! This place has the flavor, the friendliness and MY most favorite juice in Las Vegas! Get the On Point, or the Chill :) on top of flavor the quick, fast & efficient service is worth going back every day! Save your juice bottles for $1 return on your next visit! Love this and love Jamie who started the idea of bring pressed juice to this dry city.

Reviews.Author: Johana
Reviews.Content: Pricey but worth it! If you return the glass bottles you get $1 off. They open early too which is great.

Reviews.Author: Aida
Reviews.Content: BEE-yond AMAZING!!!! As an avid juicer rom California, I've tasted the BEST of the best when it comes to organic, cold-pressed juice and let me tell you there is NOTHING like this place. They truly set the bar for cold-pressed JUICE!  I was beyond mesmerized by the incredible selection of delicious juices that taste like they've been crafted by a Michelin Star chef. Each juice is a delicious concoction that was created to meet every need from simple hydration, to glowing skin to liver cleansing. I also loved that they use glass bottles instead of plastic, I re-use my glass bottle by filling it up with snacks like almonds and keeping it healthy on-the-go. Also, they have a rewarding loyalty program where you get a $1 off your next juice if you return the bottle, what a thoughtful way to recycle!  I also love the fact that Jamie and Marcella ( owners) , kindly offer you a tasting menu where you get to try all of the juices prior to buying them ( most juice places in LA do NOT offer this option). They are incredibly knowledgeable about the ingredients, benefits of juicing and take their time to pick the right product for the results you are trying to achieve.  I did the 2 week cleanse and have never felt better! Their bottle sizes are designed perfectly to keep you full and satisfied. They are also very encouraging and always check on you to see how you're holding up during your cleanse to make sure you're not pushing your body overboard.  So happy to have such a healthy and delicious juice bar in Vegas! I'm a loyal customer for life.

Reviews.Author: Porscha
Reviews.Content: I've worked at another juice bar for over 6 months, our prices were about 5$ cheaper... But that's because the produce was not organic (even though we swear up and down it is). The juice standard is the thing that changed me and made me love juice. There product is 100% organic and absolutely great tasting. The staff is so sweet and management is appropriate unlike the other one down the street... If you guys want to drink 100% organic juice, that is reasonable for what you are paying for, definitely go to the juice standard! Elle is the sweetest manager, and they give you a dollar back!

Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: Love this place! Delicious juices and great staff! Anytime I need a diet reset I'll pick up a weekend cleanse :)

Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: This place is amazing. The juices are so fresh from them being cold compressed. They offer samples for anything you would like to try. All the employees have a great attitude and are more than happy to answer any questions. This is truly a quality spot.

Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty awesome juice place that features all types of organic juice!  There is even a juice that has turmeric inside.  Another juice has black pepper.  Totally awesome juice place that only has 2 locations in the world all in Vegas.  Totally cool.

Reviews.Author: Kaelyn
Reviews.Content: I don't remember the exact date but I know I came on National Women's Day after being greeted by one of the owners. :) Though it's pretty pricey every penny was worth it! I decided to get the Bee Magnificent after sampling tons of juices and nut milks. The customer service is also on point! The owner is also very beautiful and had the most gorgeous dress lol! Need to come back ASAP and maybe try a juice cleanse. :)

Reviews.Author: Noémie
Reviews.Content: Great place for juices and they definitely have a lot of variety ! They are a little overpriced though.

Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy to know this place exists for those times I don't want to make my own juice. However - I know their juice is only on the shelf for up to 4 days (standards are up to 7), with all those beautiful veggies and fruit behind the counter I'd prefer if my juice was pressed on the spot. That and the fact they seem to have over-refined their concept to the point it seems commercial. I don't know what it is, but it would feel even healthier if it felt like a more one-off place (which I believe it actually is).   The staff is incredibly nice and the atmosphere relaxed. They serve organic espresso as well (awesome!). You can bring back your bottle for a small discount on your next juice purchase which helps swallow the price. The price doesn't bother me much knowing how many veggies and fruit it actually takes to make a juice, plus it being organic, that's just the way it is.   I recommend this place for all as health is extremely important and the quality is great!

Reviews.Author: Chantel
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this place!!! The girls that own it are so sweet and helpful.  The place is beautiful. Very welcoming!!!!  I did a 5 day cleanse. I am not normally the type to go that long on a diet like this without cheating but i actually made it thru the whole 5 days. The first 3 days were definitely the hardest but after that smooth sailing. I also work 7 days a week so I thought for sure I wouldn't have enough energy to do it but I was completely fine. I didn't feel hungry at all. I drank a juice every 2 hours because I work long days I wanted to stretch it out so I would be starving late at night.   I did this cleanse to reboot my system. I have been having problems with my thyroid and I wanted to see if detoxing would help. It definitely did!!! I feel great and have a ton of energy!!! Very happy with the results. I really wasn't expecting to lose much weight doing this considering it was only 5 days but I actually lost 9lbs. Which I'm thrilled about.  I would recommend this to anyone looking to begin a healthier lifestyle and feel better about themselves. Happy Juicing:)

Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This place may appeal to cleansers and juice aficionados, but It just wasn't my jam.  I ordered a smoothie and and seed pudding, both of which I knew were extremely healthy.  The smoothie was a little more juice based than I am used to and less chunkie.  The pudding tasted a little bland but was overall interesting.  Juice Standard is really catering towards the healthy individual who wants to cleanse and help their body.  Their ingredients and the motto is all about best ingredients.  I just was not expecting that type of health emphasis.  I'm gonna try somewhere else for my smoothies, but this place won't do you wrong if you're into the healthy, juice scene.  Their staff are knowledgable and know their stuff so give it a try if you're looking to join the health movement.

Reviews.Author: Aria
Reviews.Content: Great, organic juices. Probably the best here in Vegas. I always feel food after getting juice here.  Sure, I wish they had the creativity of Function Juicery down the street, but at least here they use lower toxin, high nutrient ingredients which will knock your socks off!  Also a very cool looking little place. Matches the modern times of yoga and Range Rovers more than the hippy juice places of yore. :)  They also have a glass bottle recycling program here remiscent of Germany. Very cool.   Glass is really the way to go. It is nontoxic, unlike the plastic used at poison juice places, and better for the planet, too. I have never understood putting awesome, healthy ingredients into an unhealthy bottle that leaches poison into juices. I am so very glad they understand that here at The JUICE Standard. Massive kudos!  Overall, this is a shop trying to and actually succeeding at doing just about everything right.   I do have a couple of wishes, however.  The first thing I wish they had was self-serve, because like a or of people, I like to hold and look at the juices... Read the ingredients. Figure out what I like.   Asking someone behind the counter for every little thing does inhibit sales to volume buyers like me somewhat. :) From the outset looking in, it looks like it has grab n' go case, but it's not. It could be. And it would be awesome.  Secondly, I wish they had some raw food options. Their juices are great. I bet their raw food would be, too!

Reviews.Author: Kenn
Reviews.Content: The Juice Standard is a nice, tiny shop that sells juice bottles as the name suggests.  100% organic, tastes good, and understandably, prices are on the high end.

Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: The best and only place for me for cold pressed organic juice blends that make being healthy a delicious choice!

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Totally love this place. I bookmarked this place for future reference along with Pressed Juice or something but the reason I chose this over the other one, even though they're both equally as close to me, was because I was heading in that direction anyway --BUT, my decision did NOT disappoint.   I was helped by Nate who offered me samples of whatever I was interested in but when I made my decision I went with Bee Honey Nut Milk, which basically tastes like chocolate milk. DELICIOUS. They have cold pressed juices, nut milks, & espresso shots.   They do have wifi here & some nutritional books you can read. Also, if you keep and clean your bottles, you can return them for $1 back, in cash or taken off your purchase!   Also, this place is the only one out of all other juice places that is 100% certified raw and organic. I will definitely be back!!

Reviews.Author: Phyllis
Reviews.Content: I stopped by around 6:40 to check this place out. Greeted by warm smiles and lovely decor. Since it was my first time, the lady let me sample all of their drinks and explain what each drink does what. She was very kind, too bad I didn't get her name.  I was going to buy the 1 day cleanse ($60) but I didn't really enjoy 4/8 of their listings. I decided to just buy 5 full size drinks.  Bee on Point: very fresh!! Bee Chill: my ideal of summer! Bee Vibrant: really refreshing with a nice kick Bee Positive: MY FAV  Bee energized: definitely something I would drink daily (lemonade like)  I'm excited to come back here even though the prices are a bit expensive. but $1 off from bringing back the glass jars, hell yes!!

Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Have yet to try something I don't like. Heard about this place from a podcast and it's right down the street from my work.   Can be a bit pricy, best best and healthiest drinks in Vegas.  Would highly recommend the  invincible coffee

Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: The Juice Standard is amazing!  I passed by the store on my way to work and this morning and made sure to stop on my way home. I have never had juice before but have been researching it and even considered buying a juice cleanse from an online company. Jaime is SO knowledgable and informative and allowed me to try any of the juices that I wanted before I bought them. I will definitely be going back tomorrow to get more!

Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Love this place! Amazing products!!! Start drinking your juice here!!! The juice is amazing and the staff always polite and very informative. Great place!!! Plus local

Reviews.Author: Janeen
Reviews.Content: I did it! Well for one day I did, And I would do it again. With the exception of one juice called love (carrot, celery, parsley & spinach) that I didn't love I was able to chug all 8 down easily. And the last one of the day, the cashew nut milk, was delicious! What a great way to finish the cleanse. I know I will be back to buy the nut milk for daily pleasure & I'm confident I will do another cleanse soon. Maybe two days next time.

Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Excellent shop for cold pressed juices and smoothies. Highly recommend for any yogis out there.   Had the Acai crunch bowl and the bee grateful juice. So yummy. Free samples too.   All of their juices are organic and made on premise.

Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Go to whole foods. This place has a very friendly staff, but thats it. If you want fresh, then go to whole foods or any of other juice place in the city. This place does not sell one fresh juice or make anything in front of you. Everything is pre made and has expiration dates and is very expensive compared to whole foods. Even the juice place inside the palazzo hotel is cheaper than this place. Stay clear. Whole foods is right down the street on ft apache and Charleston. This owner needs to re think the way her operation is run and her prices which she thinks is justifiable, but every other juice bar i have been to in vegas and California are cheaper and fresher, maybe because its always slow that she has to jack up the prices. Who knows.   Edit: 7-2-14 So, I stop by Jamba juice and have a much fresher vegetable juice made right in front of me for half the price of the juice standard.  I wonder who keeps writing all the good reviews for the juice standard? The owners friends?  I just dont understand the 5 stars from people.

Reviews.Author: Abi
Reviews.Content: The juice was massively overpriced and came in a tiny glass bottle, but even then it tasted so weird I didn't even drink it all. How can you mess up watermelon juice? It's watermelon; it should be delicious no matter what you do to it. The customer service basically amounted to telling the customer that she's wrong, cheap and fat and thus cannot possibly understand real juicing.

Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: Just had a really great experience in this juice bar. First thing I noticed was that the cashier washed his hands and use gloves as he helped me try a couple samples to decide what I wanted. I'm currently on a juice cleanse so I went with the Bee Resilient 100% juice with fresh spinach Romain cucumber kale parsley micro greens lemon and ginger. You can definitely taste the parsley in this one, but that's what I wanted. Everything I need for a clean Green Day. I will definitely be returning!

Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: This place has very delicious juices! The employee was very nice and patient while I tried all the juices. In the end, I got the Bee Legendary and what can I say? I was not disappointed! Definitely a place to try!

Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: The Juice Standard is my spot!  I absolutely love all of their juices, and they have a VERY friendly and knowledgable staff.  I've stopped in several times, but thought it might be time to drop them some Yelp love because they are a locally owned business that loves their local customers.  Each time that I've stopped in, I've had different questions, symptoms...and whatnot. The staff is always down to answer any questions. Go ahead. Try to stump them.  They're all well-trained and friendly. The juices are fresh, and tasty. Pricing is on-par with most other cold-pressed spots, and when your return your bottles, you get a buck off for each return.  If you are adventurous and seeking thrills, try the wellness or flu shots. They are spicy, but after a couple days of regular doses (is that the right phrase?), you'll feel like a million bucks.  Word on the street is that they might be opening a spot in Green Valley. I'm never over there, but for those of you that are...that should bode well for you.

Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: The juices are decent, but the smoothies are not good. I've tried the Berry and the Green one, both were gross and I threw them out. They are so watered down with almond milk and coconut water that they taste bland.

Reviews.Author: Lance
Reviews.Content: Save the $225 for a three day cleanse and give it to a homeless person as they are the only person that will be hungrier than you will be.   Perhaps Juice Cleanses aren't for everyone; and I think I would fall into that category. But I guess my expectations were slightly higher, given the very high price of the whole package.   Bottom line is I should have researched more about this fad, as I think a juice cleanse might be more effective if it were tailored to each person's age, height, weight, etc. The  Standard Cleanse  was a waste of my hard earned money, and I will pursue other avenues for a healthy lifestyle.

Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: These ladies are pressing up the most delectable dietary delights in Las Vegas! It's a five star experience all the way to organic nirvana.  HPP means high pressure pressing. All USDA organic, non GMO. A lot of their produce is sourced from California, which means a smaller carbon footprint. Their bottling is either glass (all class) or plastic, and the plastic bottles are, of course, BPA free. What's not to love?  If that's not enough to entice you, the radiant ladies they have behind the counter (or the adorable Queen Bees that are wandering the floor this afternoon) are incredibly friendly AND knowledgable. Their concept goes beyond trendy. When they began to tell me about how certain vitamins will be absorbed 100% because of the pairings with other vegetables, and a mention of trace minerals (87 in BeWhealthy, if you're counting), I knew I had come to the right place! It's a breath of fresh air having nutrition that makes sense and does work for you, instead of just adding chia seed to everything and calling it healthy.  Their selection of smoothies are limited to a mere four, but they run the gamut of every avenue of nutrition you need. Fruit based, protein based, veggie based, and fat based (think coconut, avocado). They have superfood add-ons as well such as chia, hemp, flax, coconut meat, bee pollen, spirulina, nutritional yeast.. The list goes on. I've tried all but the protein smoothie and can confidently say they are delicious and filling! I love my liquid lunches on the go.  The space itself is gorgeous and inspiring, the branding and bottling is sexy, the juices are not only good for you, but specifically crafted to be delicious while beneficial to your health. Bee well!

Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Been here many times! The juice is out if this world. The nut milk rocks! The service is awesome... Wish I could drink this stuff daily...

Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: I love this place too much to give them a 1 star but I really don't think they should still close early on Sunday lolol but they're always super friendly and always very helpful and I can't help but come here at least once a week. They have detox cleanses too but that's like $70 a day up to 3 days total. Anyways juice standard is on the $$ end but the juices are worth it and the workers try their best to serve their customers as best as they can and I'm probably gonna come back here again next week haha

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: They have the purest juices and smoothies in Vegas. I've tried nearly every juice bar in town and I make them myself, but I keep coming back to TJS! Plus, the staff is so informed! They guide you through all the options in such a friendly and loving way. It's inspiring to see their passion. Love this spot!

Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: Incredible variety of juices and they even have cashew milks.  The staff is so friendly and they let you try anything!  Reading the menu at first can be daunting but they will gladly walk you through it.  They offer a $1 off your next purchase if you return your glass bottles washed. Would give 5 stars but the pricing seems high to me... $9 for 16 oz of one of the cashew milk blends.  I also tried a green smoothie with kale, avocado and coconut and it was delicious.

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: This place rocks. They let you taste everything, just ask nicely! My favorite is the Bee Happy.

Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I knew nothing about juicing, but the staff changed that.  Very knowledgeable on all things juice and nut milks.  LOVED that you could sample.  I was pleasantly surprised by how much I enjoyed the juices.  And drinking out of a glass bottle was the BOMB.  I did the juice cleanse....highly recommend.   Not inexpensive, but totally worth it.  This is the Standard in Juice in my humble opinion!!!!!.

Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: The owner Jamie is extremely helpful and sweet. The best juices in Vegas. The veggie juices are thin and light and the dessert/sweet juices are thick and filling- how they should be(opposite of suja)!

Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I tried their version of bulletproof coffee. It is very tasty, includes grass fed butter, coconut oil, and almond cream also. It is made with espresso. I also sampled their juices while I was there, and they are very good. I will be back for juice also. It's worth a stop by their store.

Reviews.Author: Jojo
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what Vegas needs and I've been waiting for it! I meant to go eventually but I didn't think I would run into it the day after I discovered it on Instagram. It was my birthday and I went next door for a massage and there it was. Cute little joint. Looks like an all natural, organic place and it is! They have a variety of juices to choose from. Comes in a few sizes. Jamie, the lady at the counter basically told me about most of the juices! She is incredibly knowledgeable of all the products and she told me all about them and the benefits some of the ingredients have. They bottle the juices in glass jars that are not completely secure with a twist off cap. It's like a pop on/off cap so she recommended to not put it in your purse and have it standing straight up. If you bring your bottle back you get a dollar off your next purchase every time. Juices are made fresh every day also! I will be coming back more often. I want to try all of them!

Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: I did a 3-day cleanse and the entire staff was super informative and helpful and gave me samples before I fully committed. Their juices are just so pure and fresh - I absolutely love it there. Marcela (one of the owners) was super friendly.  They've got a huge selection and really something for everyone's taste. This will definitely be my  go-to  from now on. At the end of the cleanse I lost 4lbs of just yucky, bloated, sodium-filled nastiness and I feel back to normal now. It has definitely reset my button and I'm back on track and into my usual workout routines which I have way more energy for now. Thanks everyone!

Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The first time we went here we samples all of the different juices, and the owner sold us on the cleanse package, telling us that if we returned the bottles, that they would give us $1 off per bottle.   When we got home late afternoon, we noticed 4 of the juices expired that day, and we needed to drink them that evening (not thrilled).  We didn't get the chance to drink them all in time before they expired.   We decided for us, we would prefer to go buy the juice that we intend to drink instantly. When we went back today, we brought the 12 bottles back, and just wanted 2 drinks.  They told us that they would take the 12 bottles ($12 off), but only give us $2 off this order, with a receipt showing an additional 10 bottles returned.  I explained that we only intend to buy drinks as we drink them, so we won't ever buy 12 at a time again.  They said  that's fine, but we can't give you the discount .  Bottom line:  they are willing to give a discount of $1 per bottle returned. But they will only do it bottle for bottle, meaning that they try to lock you in to buying bulk. I hate small businesses that hide behind bate-n-lock-in  policy  over common sense and putting the customer first.   Customer service is poor here.

Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Great place !! Their friendly helpful staff made us feel right at home. We tasted many of their many healthy juices, before placing our juice and smoothie orders. Well be back soon. Tell all your friends about this great place !!

Reviews.Author: Sessa
Reviews.Content: Sooo good! I have been a fan since day 1! The owners are so knowledgeable about all things healthy and which juice does what and why. It's a super cute place and I love it is a local shop!! It's easy to stay healthy when you are a regular here! Oh and their gorgeous glass bottles although look super cute they recycle! Being back rinsed bottles and receive a 1$ credit towards future juice!! Oh and they are expanding their food menu!! Everything is amazing!!

Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Even though this place is all the way across town from where I live it is worth the drive every week to get cold pressed juices from here.   The staff is always friendly and I remember that the first time here I was a bit overwhelmed with all the selections they had.  The gentleman at the counter asked questions to see which juices I preferred and then gave me samples to try so we could narrow down the ones I wanted to leave with.   I also learned that they give their juices a 4 day expiration from the time pressed even though the health department states that they may have a shelf life of 7 days. The greatest part is that all of the ingredients are organic. So the price point is perfect when you think about the quality of ingredients you are getting. Another plus is that when you bring back the bottle to them for recycling they give you a $1 credit to use.   My favorite is the Bee WHealthy because I enjoy juices with more greens than fruits. Also, Bee Effective is delicious because they add coconut water to the greens which adds a sweet touch. It's so good that even the boyfriend drinks them and he never eats greens or fruits. I find this a perfect way to incorporate a healthy start to any day.

Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: This is definitely my new favorite juice bar! The staff was extremely welcoming,friendly, and helpful. They also let you sample any of their juices or nut milks which is awesome and something I have not seen other places do. I look forward to my next purchase and experiencing more of their products!

Reviews.Author: Porsche
Reviews.Content: This place definitely lives up to the name, they are the standard that I hold all my juices up to. A lot fail miserably, unfortunately, so I stick to using my time to juice at home when I'm not going here.   They have all raw, organic cleanses and I am in love. The bottles are glass and you get $1 off per bottle if you return them when you refill. I actually keep them though for my juices at home because the portion size is perfect per couple hours.   They are of course on the pricey side when you're talking about glass bottles, raw, organic, but it's completely worth it to set your standards high when you make the decision to juice. I love this place and highly recommend.

Reviews.Author: Elaina
Reviews.Content: Today was my first visit and customer service is awesome. I love that they offer to let you sample all the juices and explain each one. After tasting them all, there was only 2 of the regular juices that were tolerable on taste for me. And the nut milks, I liked 2 of them a lot. I'm not a regular juicer, but I have tried Pressed Juicery and Suja. Now Suja I am a fan, because of taste and price is cheaper. I ended up buying a B Whealthy which is a top seller and it's taken me all day to drink it .

Reviews.Author: JK
Reviews.Content: Green & Good juice from  J  Love - Excellent!  Very nice staff they provided samples of various juices. All of them tasted pretty good.  I will be back for more Love Juice... aka G&G... and a few others....

Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: THE best in town. Local girls, grassroots, all organic, friendly and knowledgeable staff. I can't get enough of their juices and cleanse. I've tried every juice place in town and they are undeniably the most educated and well run! Worth the extra dollars! Plus they are saving the environment one adorable and recyclable glass bottle at a time!

Reviews.Author: Terrence
Reviews.Content: I walked in Feeling sick. Then I met Stacie. She is a true Educator in The juice World. She told me about the Shot flight. I tried and After 30 minutes I suddenly started to Feel better. I do Recommend  this juice bar more than any others. I would always support they are t

Reviews.Author: Lino
Reviews.Content: We regularly make our own juices at home but while on vaca it's hard to find a place that can offer the same or even better. We found this place and we really impressed with the amount of juices they offer as well as nut milks and coffee specialties. The staff was really friendly and let us have samples of their juices. The young gentleman also suggested we try a sample of their bee happy nut milk and we are so glad he did. It tasted just like chocolate milk. All the ingredients are organic which is really important when it comes to juicing. All the juices are already made and come in glass bottles that resemble old milk jugs. They do charge a dollar per bottle that is refunded when you bring them back clean.  Now I'm sure some people might feel that considering the cost of the juices it should be included but I think it's a great incentive to bring back the bottles so they can reuse them and therefore cause less waste. It would be a shame to see all those bottles being thrown out.  We were able to return all but one which we rinsed and brought home with us to reuse. With all the bad food we eat on vaca it's nice to have a place that can offer some much needed nutrition. I just wish they had a kiosk or truck closer to the strip.

Reviews.Author: Lehua
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this place! Every time I've gone in there I've received such amazing customer service. My first experience was with Tiana and she was extremely helpful. I truly appreciated her kindness, patience and knowledge. I loved that I could tell her what I was hoping to accomplish like healthy insides such as digestive track, good organs like liver, etc and she would always have wonderful recommendations.   The best part about my experience was that I was literally able to sample EVERYTHING! that's such a big deal when you're spending anywhere from $9-$13 bucks a bottle, like she said, you want to make sure you're getting what YOU as the customer will enjoy.   I ended up with several different flavors like Bee On Point, Bee Effective, Bee Chill and Bee Happy which were all delicious. When I returned the next day or two I was helped by another kind employee who unfortunately I didn't catch her name who was also a pleasure to interact with and she recommended their smoothies as well.   I tried the Acai something which had fresh bananas, coconut flakes, pumpkin seeds and this heavenly granola. It was so scrumptious I went back 2 days in a row and have officially converted my husband thanks to the last employee's kindness who surprised me by making a sample for him to try so I wouldn't have to share mine.  Overall, fabulous experience but yes, a little pricey. But hey, you can't put a price on your health!

Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: The very best juice on the planet! They seriously have the best juices ever! Along with many nutmilks, amazing shakes, dried snacks and one of the healthiest coffee drinks you can get! Make your life better get some today!

Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: So I've been coming here for over 9 months now and let me tell you absolutely AMAZING!!!!!  I f'cking love Juice! I can't believe how hooked I am. Their juice is impact with delicious flavors from organic fruits and vegetables.   The staff are all really great. They help you select the right juice for you whether your just juicing for dieting, to help allergies or for healthy reason... They know their products very well.  You can sample the juices before you purchase which is a big plus.   One of the owners I met was such a sweetie.  You can tell she loves what she does. Not to mention she gorgeous. She looks like a model. She pretty much sells her products just by standing there.   What I love about their juice is that it doesn't have that grainy texture. Their nut-milks are perfectly smooth and subtle. I'm all about their nut-milks!  It's the best meal replacer for my busy schedule.  The bottles are a bit pricey but when you calculate the process, labor, especially love and care to make these flawless drinks you'll appreciate the prices more.  By far the best juice shop I've tried!

Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: Nice place to eat.defiantly recomend.I'll be back with friends soon. Good service friendly and prompt.

Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: Love this place- great product and even better staff!  Will definitely be back for more.

Reviews.Author: Molliana
Reviews.Content: Mmmmm. Loving this jive new place! It's cute and the juices are awesome. Taste test any and all.

Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: This place is for when you just want to feel a little healthier and in tune with your body.  My husband's boss swears by this place, so I came one time to check it out.  I appreciate that they let you sample any of the juices on the menu, cuz juices can be a bit scary sometimes, you know?  And when you are paying around $12 for a bottle, you better make sure you like it.  I was surprised when the fellow behind the counter said,  Do you want to try all of them?   He was going to let me have like 15 samples.  I just tried the three that I was deciding between and went with a yummy and sweet one that had carrots, apples, and pineapple in it.  A few weeks later, after the holidays and I was feeling like a big fat bloated cow, I decided to do their 3-day juice cleanse.  They label every bottle for you so you know in which order to drink them and give you tips on how to get through the 3-day cleanse if you're a newbie like I was.  The cleanse went well and I felt a whole heck of a lot better afterwards.  I took a star off because they are a bit pricey.  I've gotten juices for cheaper at other places.  Also, in the cleanse, I wish there had been more variety.  Of the 8 drinks each day, 4 of them are green juices, so I got tired of constantly drinking those.  HOWEVER, I did do this cleanse during the winter when a lot of fruits/vegetables aren't available, so perhaps in the spring and summer they rotate in some other flavors.

Reviews.Author: Jazmin
Reviews.Content: I came here on a Monday yes MONDAY morning when they were barely opening. I never know what to expect anymore when I go to juice places, nice people or stuffy staff its usually one or the other. The Juice Standard exceeded my expectations in customer service. They took the time to show me samples and inform me on what each vegetable blended into the juice would do to my body. I did see them making fresh juice, however they gave me a bottle that was already ready. Which was still delicious but I felt I was missing out on the fresh, here ya go, feeling. Overall it's a pretty cool place, nice staff, cool ambiance and is close to the gym. Is a little pricy so will have to visit only when I feel like splurging...

Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: This place cured me. Flu shot and vitamin c pack two days in a row took away my cold immediately!  Juices also very tasty

Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: Amazing service, Thank you AJ‼ Was speaking of wanting to meet the Goddess Jamie one of the empowered owners of The Juice Standard and she walks in... Magical Moment to Marinate in for sure!  Left with a full happy .  I love this place!!! The juices taste amazing!! ALL ORGANIC AND GLASS BOTTLES!!! Wow‼

Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Love it!  The juice tastes good and I love the packaging. They'll give you $1 off if you bring back your bottles, which I have no intention of doing since I just love them and I repurpose them for my daughter's milk bottles. I'd love to try the 3 day cleanse, if I ever muster up enough courage to not eat for 3 days (4 hours of not eating is rough for me!)

Reviews.Author: F
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love their juice. The location is awesome!!!! I can't wait to start my 3 day!!! The Juice Standard sets the bar high anything other than them is sub standard!!!!   The juice queens, Jamie and Marcella are an absolute gem!!!! Love love love them!!!!

Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Been a customer since 2005 i know the owners there when they used to serve the tea, the staff that's serving now are great people! Hard working and very friendly especially Ice she always makes my drink very good as well as the other people there make it good too! Natural fruits is the only way to go! Thanks and yes you guys are the #1 boba in las Vegas! Aloha! Steve from Aloha Tinting

Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The juices here are great! Granted I didn't like every single one but most of them are wonderful. I don't remember which ones I've tried but the ones that taste like lemonade are amazing! Their smoothies aren't bad either. They are a little pricey but I think they're worth it. I love the bottles that they come in!   The workers are welcoming and knowledgeable, which is rare at juicing places. I love that they let you sample anything before buying!

Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: OOPS! To correct my review they are non-HPP! Important part not to leave out!

Reviews.Author: Trihnity
Reviews.Content: This place just opened in the southwest area LV. Im super excited! The girl at the register helped me with the taste testing of every juice they sell. Some were amazing and some were ok. It depends on your choice of taste. She was very knowledgable on all the drinks. The juices break down to whats in it and what it is good for. They have certain memberships if your interested but I was just there for a bottle or two. I choose the  abundant  and the  royal  $11 a drink. One nutty and one fruity. I suggest you taste test before purchasing! It helps a lot more. The bottles are glass and if you bring back the glasses you save $1 on your next purchase. How sweet is that. I'll be back to purchase more drinks. They are kinda pricey but think of each drink as a healthy meal replacement.     3/26/14. A couple days later and I am back to try their juice cleanse! A one day juice cleanse package is $60, it includes 8 12oz bottles to drink for the full day. 3 WHealthy, 2 Love, 1 Pure, 1 energized, and 1 Magnificent (kinda like dessert for the night). Me and my boyfriend decided to do it together to see how it feels. They number the bottles for you to know exactly what you need to drink every 1 1/2- 2 hours. I'm pretty excited. A one day cleanse every two weeks or every month would not hurt. I would do this once a week if I could afford it. Haha Thank You Jamie for your help! :)

Reviews.Author: LeAndria
Reviews.Content: Amazing staff!  I went in for lunch after already picking what I wanted online.  El greeted me when I walked in right away. And even offered samples.  She was very knowledgeable! I was blown away and based on the info she provided I ended up changing what I originally choose and getting BEE MAGNIFICENT it was amazing.  I definitely plan on going bck.  And when I grow a pair I will start the 3 day cleanse.  Lol

Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: Their juice cleanse really works. The first day was a little tough-by the end of the first day I had a headache and was nauseous all night. I took that as a definite sign that I was detoxing which is what I wanted. The second day was much easier and I felt a lot better- and by the morning of the third day I felt really good- I also felt like I could keep going on this fast easily for another day or two at least- but unfortunately I had a dinner I had to attend that night so technically I only did it 2.5 days. It helped get rid of my cravings for unhealthy food and I felt like my mind was much more clear. Would definitely recommend either a 1 day or 3 day cleanse- I think there is still a great benefit to just a 1 day cleanse- and once you get past the second day it's really easy to do a 3 day cleanse- if you don't start to get sick of juice by then. Lol I hope to do a 1 day cleanse weekly for a while- or a longer 3-5 day cleanse when I get back from an upcoming trip. I just love how convenient and high quality their juice is too.

Reviews.Author: Chelsey
Reviews.Content: I'm addicted to this place! Love rehydrating here and getting protein after workouts. The staff is super helpful and they have so many juices to choose from they can cater to your needs. Can get pricey tho. That's the only reason I didn't give 5 stars. Two big thumbs up!

Reviews.Author: Tammi
Reviews.Content: I just moved here from Houston, Texas. I've been searching for a juice place for 3 weeks to no avail. The locals in town were telling me to go to Jamba Juice, and hadn't heard of an actual juice bar. I happened to stumble upon the juice standard on Tuesday, and I am in heaven. This place is amazing. They don't make the juice right there in front of you, individually, like in Houston. But, they have several to choose from and they make them everyday so you're never hurting for a particular flavor. The bottles are large, at 16.9 oz and they are $9 each. Also, you will get a discount if you bring the bottles back. (please at least rinse them, otherwise that's gross) So far I have tried  the bee legendary & bee magnificent nut milks and they are fabulous. I have also tried the bee whealthy & bee on point and they are also delish. I would definitely recommend stopping by this juice bar!

Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: This place is the bomb!  Juices are freshly pressed and they provide free samples, so there's no mystery on what you purchase.  Their selections are plenty and they are very informative on what benefit each juice does.    The only thing is when they run out, they run out and you will have to come back again the next day.  I made the mistake going in on Saturday and they were out of my first 4 selections.  It was frustrating but I guess this is a good frustration because you know everything is made fresh.    The price is a bit steep but it's about the same almost every where, so for first timer, be prepare for the tag price but you will not get any fresher juices than fresh pressed from here.  I encounter someone that even drove out of their way from The Strip to get some juices.

Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: Well. I'm not sure where to start with this one... The place itself is really cute. It's clean and has a very cool bar for seating.  I sampled the juices and they were very good.   However.. I decided to get the protein power smoothie. Now I have had a hundred different kinds of smoothies and I am not picky at all. Plus the ingredients were all ones I am very familiar with so it sounded good. But it tasted like a salad. Like a salad with parsley, mustard and agave. Not a good combination at all.   I would come back to get a juice or even the Acai bowl by definitely wouldn't recommend their smoothies.

Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: One of the best cold pressed juice stands I've been too!!!  Would recommend the smoothies and health shots.  Amazing nut milks  Salads and acia bowls are on point

Reviews.Author: Ania
Reviews.Content: I love attempting to convince myself of living a healthier lifestyle!   I came here & spent nearly $60 for juice! I then went to Yoshinoya & Krispy Kreme. Who am I fooling!?!?   Ok let's move on because there's no helping me. This place really has it going on. It's very clean, very cute & the juice presentations are awesome. It definitely inspires one to get healthy even if that lasts for only an hour.   I walked in & was immediately greeted by the nicest kid who is eager to sample me up & we had a lot of fun trying nearly everything. Sampling is the smartest thing ever because it really gets us in the mood to spend more money & I instantly knew what I could attempt to drink and what I absolutely couldn't. I love that he tried getting me in on the healthiest ones which I had a hard time swallowing. Grass isn't my favorite flavor. Some of these juices were way too hard core for me however I was pleasantly surprised that some of them tasted really good! So I went for it & splurged!
