They have so many great fresh ingredients such as apples, cucumbers, celery, lemons, kale, beets, Brazilian nuts, vanilla & so much more!   My plan is to skip lunch & juice it up at work. We shall see how long I last before someone forces me to eat something because I'm extra mean when hangry. This stuff is all natural & organic & I'm excited! Hopefully I have some will power before my mom gets back in town & I find myself dying in Zion again :)  Hi mom :) Love you!  (My mom loves reading my reviews) lol

Reviews.Author: Bianca
Reviews.Content: This review is over due. I did the one day cleanse last year and let me tell you it cleansed. But more importantly all of their juices are delicious, I especially love the nut milk and the BeeWhealthy.

Reviews.Author: Geneva
Reviews.Content: The service was very good. They had my cleanse ready for pick up at designated time. I had to go 3 times days to pick up. I would have given them 5 stars but the taste of the juices varied extremely. I did a 10 cleanse so went for 3 separate batches. The good thing is that the variance in flavor means it's made in small batchs but some days it was lemon juice overload. I did not lose any weight but it did clear me of all carb cravings. It's a tad pricey but fresh fruit and vegetables are also expensive.

Reviews.Author: SR
Reviews.Content: I'm just going to say it - the Juice Standard is like being in a really good relationship. When you've been up all night drinking, you know this place will make you feel better about life. And when you've been binge eating pizza and burgers all week, you know these juices will make you feel zen again.  So not only are the juices amazing, the I think I will eat one of their parfaits every day for the rest of my life. No joke. They will make you want to take the long way home. That literally just happened. If you're even thinking about coming here, just stop thinking and do it! You will be in pure bliss!

Reviews.Author: Stefany
Reviews.Content: I love this place- the packaging is high-quality,  the space is pretty and bee-themed (love the honeycomb chalkboard signage!), and the juices are downright delicious! I appreciate the fact that they use high-quality ingredients and source from nearby California, and I especially love that their juices are bottled to take and enjoy over the next few days. Add in that they're raw, organic, non-HPP, and everything else Gwyneth Paltrow would approve of, and you've got a stellar product.   I recently moved here from the Bay area and was unpleasantly surprised that so many places here in LV claim that they have juice, only to give me an overpriced rinky-dink plastic cup with a non-harmonious medley of fruits and veggies. I am sorely missing vendors like Juicer Heroes, Project Juice, and the ever-convenient Pressed.  I am so happy to find a company putting forth the quality of product that I expect when I am juicing. I will admit to being a little put off by pricing- which is $10+/bottle, higher even than trendy Cali prices, by a good 20%. They have a niche product though, and their portions are slightly larger. I will definitely be taking advantage of their bottle-return discounts though. I would like to be able to pull up nutritional info on each particular juice online, as it is not posted on the bottle itself: their website also is well-designed and informative, just as they are in-store.   Overall: service is friendly, space is attractively decorated, and the product itself is high-quality. I hope to see more local companies picking up the slack and providing more options that are on par with the standard set here at Juice Standard! I hope they add some sort of loyalty program for frequent juicers as they settle in- I love a liquid lunch but I can't swing $300/month for it.  Favorite juices so far are Bee Effective (greens), Bee On Point, and Bee Loved.

Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I swear by the shot flight!!!! It makes me feel amazing & energized after a long night ;)

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am in love with all of their juices. Their easy to take down being that they are so smooth. My favorites are BeeGrateful, BeeRoyal and BeeChill. They all have great benefits and are enjoyable to drink because they taste delicious. I love how my skin glows days after drinking these cold pressed juices. BeeEffective is known to make your skin glow and although it does taste good (to me) you have to be open to having something more  green  tasting.

Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of juice, so I was very happy to find out there's one right next to Massage Nirvana. It's so convenient after a massage that The Juice Standard is next door for hydration! I love everything about this place, the juice, the look, the staff, and the options. I went there 3 days ago for the 2nd time, but this time the girl was very helpful and asked me if I wanted to taste before purchasing. That really helped make my choice. The only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars, is because of the high prices. I paid about $25 for 2 bottles of juice, not including tip! I wish I could make this a daily habit of mine, but for this price, it can only be a luxury for me. Definitely will go back after a massage though.

Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I would give them 5 stars if their prices were a little bit lower.  As for the product itself, 10 STARS!!! Just kidding. But I really do love the flavors, fresh ingredients and location. As a Vegan, I'm always on the look out for new ways to fill my cravings.

Reviews.Author: Candice
Reviews.Content: The juice standard is a great place to pick up cold pressed juice. They have just about every blend you could want. I do enjoy their nut milks as well. The staff is friendly and helpful, offering samples of the blend before you buy.

Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Thanks for helping me change my life. Your juices are amazing and I'll never stop coming here. Your products help me go from 228lbs to 179lbs in a matter of 6 months. Thanks again for everything.

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS PLACE!  the staff is super helpful in suggesting a juice to help you.  A group of friends and I did the 5 day juice cleanse & LOVED the results!  lost weight, inches, and felt energetic & happy.  My kids even love the juice.  the Be Happy is my son's favorite while mine is Bee On Point.  go check them out, you will fall in love.

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Ive been going here for months and this place is now how I manage my weight! The Bee Whealthy and Bee Grateful are two of my favorites!

Reviews.Author: Joann
Reviews.Content: My friend Christine recommended me to this place and I've been hooked ever since. The service is always excellent and they are all super friendly. You can sample as many juices as you'd like to ensure that you are truly satisfied with the choice you pick.   I like the Bee Effective and the nut milk that tastes like chocolate milk.  It's a plus that this local shop tries to find organic produce for their juices. You also get $1 off your drink if you bring in an old bottle to recycle! Great promo :)

Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: This place is awesome! great tasting juice & the employees are always nice & knowledgeable.

Reviews.Author: Ghia
Reviews.Content: I'm not a big fan of juicing at home - things just end up warm and messy. Instead, I prefer making a green smoothie every morning with my handy-dandy Vitamix. However, a month before my wedding, I got really sick/tired/cranky/lazy. I had people staying at my house during my bachelorette party and didn't want to make them up with my VItamix. Instead, I snuck out of the house in the early morning and went to The Juice Standard for the first time. I got their Bee WHealthy and Bee Energized drinks to power me through the weekend, and thank god I did! My husband hates juices too, but I bought him a couple for the weekend and he was hooked as well. The two owners of the store are great people who are clearly passionate about what they're doing The workers here are very well-informed and will also let you sample anything you'd like to try. For the weeks leading to the wedding, it was just so much more convenient to pop in here and grab a few juices just in case we found ourselves not being health-conscious with our eating habits.   Juices are a bit pricey, but their packaging is high-quality and keeps the juices really cold when transporting them. You can also earn some redemption dollars by giving back any used bottle ($1 off a future purchase for every bottle you return). Don't forget to grab a couple of their tall straws while you're in there, it's just so much easier drinking the juices with them!

Reviews.Author: Gigi
Reviews.Content: Im doing a juice fast, and this place is great. First time here and I love it. I got to try many kinds of different juoces before deciding and all their juice is fresh, in glass bottles,  and most importantly ORGANIC . FIVE STARS because Ive been to places like this in LA but the ingredients they use for their juices amazing. Their wasnt one juice I didnt like.  Will come again.

Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: The best organic cold pressed juices. Love this place. Addicted to the Green Cleanse. Try the Acai Bowl. Everything Eco friendly in glass bottles....

Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: In a little nook of the city dwells this paradise. The associates are either a hit or miss, but this oasis is far from Vegas' chaos and offers a plethora of delicious, divinely healthy juices. You can't go wrong with the Bee Cosmopolitan, as its refreshing ingredients deliver a knockout punch to any ailment.  Glass bottles and you're supporting a community that cares about bees? Plus this location is nowhere near the obnoxious craziness of The Strip?   Some may say pricey, but you can either drink yourself into a stupor for a dollar or actually, I don't know, drink goodness?  Pros: Great selection of delicious, healthy drinks, nowhere near The Strip's madness  Cons: Service can be hit or miss

Reviews.Author: Nikkayla
Reviews.Content: I've been to so many juice places (live in Southern California) and this is by far the highest quality, and most delicious juices and milks. My boyfriend and I were overwhelmed with how cute the spot it and the people that were there were so helpful.   Not to mention they had bulletproof coffee. If I lived in Vegas, it would be extremely difficult not to come daily! We went 2x/day last time we were in Vegas.

Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: They have an amazing variety of cold pressed juices. They will walk you through every type as well as let you sample each and every option. You can buy a pre-organized juice cleanse that is tailored to provide maximum energy and efficacy.   I have a nut allergy so I can't drink all of their juices but they use a separate machine for the nut milks so I never have to worry about cross contamination. If you juice at all you will love this place. And if you are thinking about starting, this is the perfect place to get your juice on.

Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: This juice is delicious and good for you the staff in very helpful and took thier time helping me pick something. I'm so going back

Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The customer service is excellent.  They are always in a great mood!  It doesn't matter if it's the morning or night crew!  The Bee invincible starts my morning and keeps me going all afternoon!
